name: GunShot BattleGrounds (Season1)
description:
-------------------GunShot BattleGrounds (S1)---------------

1) WASD and arrow keys to move space or mouse down to shoot and for smartphone the right joystick is for AIM and shoot and the left one is for moving.

2) Copy the savecode by triple clicking and paste it also please don't hack the game this is a game which you have to play on your own.

3) This game is made in scratch so if you can then please go and like that project over there  -  https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/532826169/    (it would help me alot)

4) Each season ends in a month that means 1st July will be a new season and the season items are legendry and shop items are rare.

------------------------------Credits---------------------------------

1) In the game :)

-------------------------------Notes----------------------------------

1) If you find any bug please let me know and any suggestions also but the suggestions will be added when the pass ends if you want you can remix the scratch project and add them so that I can copy them easily and credit you!

2) FAKE SAVECODES WILL BE DELETED
